prompt:

Nurse: I'm glad to hear that. How has your day been so far?

Patient: God. Just, you know, going over what I need to do where I need to go, what I need to do, and all that. So I'm Really, really busy with preparing for the stay at surgery. Like, I hope my people improve after the surgery and I'm able to move around without pain after the surgery. And I'm just really, really I am ready to recover. I'm ready to recover before the surgery. I mean, I don't know if you got that, but I'm very scared. And Whenever I'm scared, I'm just very talkative, and I talk a lot, and I can talk on and on and on about things. And, also, like, I'm really grateful and Thank you so much for calling me. Like, I'm a really I wanna talk about things. I mean, I have much pain with movement, and I am really, really tired of it, and I'm ready to move. I'm ready to do things that I love. I'm ready to be normal. Know, it's like, You go outside and you see people do all kinds of things. And I'm like, oh my gosh. I cannot even bend over. I cannot even have a flat? Like, what kind of life is that? You know what I mean? It's just a so much. And I'm like, no. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No dialing. You need to take care of yourself, Paxton, and you need to really move on and You're young and you're bright and you have great career, and you eating good, and you're taking care of yourself. So it's really time about time to heal. It's time to move on. It's really, really It's okay. So I said a lot, and I guess yeah. What what are your thoughts? What are your thoughts? I've said a lot. So So tell me,

Nurse: I appreciate your openness. It sounds like you're really looking forward to getting your new knee and getting back to doing the things you love without pain. Is that correct?

Patient: Yeah. Yeah. You got it.

Nurse: That's wonderful to hear. With your new knee, do you have any specific activities or hobbies you're excited to get back to?

Patient: Well, as I said in my opening message. Heck yeah. I'm ready to do some hiking, biking, swimming, you know, walking, running. I wanna do it all.

responses.gpt4: That's a fantastic positive attitude! Achieving those mobility goals will be a great motivator through your recovery. Do you have any specific questions or concerns about the surgery process?
responses.our_model: That sounds fantastic. It's great to hear that you're eager to get back to an active lifestyle. Now, how are you feeling about your upcoming procedure?
